description: Create user wallets from your frontend in under 5 minutes
note: This quickstart uses Next.js, but the same patterns work with any React setup.
howItWorks: This quickstart uses `@crossmint/client-sdk-react-ui` to integrate Crossmint wallets into a React app. The `CrossmintProvider` component wraps your app and manages API authentication. `CrossmintAuthProvider` handles user login, while `CrossmintWalletProvider` automatically creates a wallet when users sign in. The `useAuth` and `useWallet` hooks provide access to authentication state and wallet operations.

snippets.title: Configure the Providers
snippets.description: Wrap your app with Crossmint providers to enable authentication and wallet creation.
snippets.accordion: The `CrossmintProvider` initializes the SDK with your API key. `CrossmintAuthProvider` manages user sessions. `CrossmintWalletProvider` with `createOnLogin` automatically creates a wallet on Base Sepolia when users authenticate.

snippets.title: Add Authentication
snippets.description: The `useAuth` hook provides `login`, `logout`, and the current `user` state.
snippets.accordion: Calling `login()` opens the Crossmint authentication modal. Users can sign in with email or social providers. Once authenticated, `user` contains their email and account details.

snippets.title: Display Wallet Info
snippets.description: The `useWallet` hook returns the connected `wallet` and its creation `status`.

snippets.title: Check and Fund Balance
snippets.description: Use `wallet.balances()` to fetch token balances and `wallet.stagingFund()` to add testnet tokens.

snippets.title: Transfer Tokens
snippets.description: Use `wallet.send()` to transfer tokens to another address.
